title.rendered:
HIGHGATE EXPANDS AWARD-WINNING LUXURY LIFESTYLE PORTFOLIO


USA – English





USA – English

content.rendered:
The Joule, Le Meridien Central Park, The Bellevue and Amrit Ocean Resort Among Recent Additions

NEW YORK, Jan. 17, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Highgate announced today that it has assumed management of the landmark Joule in Dallas and Le Meridien Central Park in New York City and will be managing the upcoming Amrit Ocean Resort in Singer Island, Monterey Beach Hotel and the redevelopment of the Bellevue Hotel Philadelphia, which will all open in 2024.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/highgate-expands-award-winning-luxury-lifestyle-portfolio-302036740.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
